title: Bunge: A New Era Of Agribusiness Dominance
text: Bunge Global SA offers compelling value post-Viterra merger, trading at a 12.7x forward P/E and a discount to ADM. BG's integration with Viterra enhances global logistics operational 'granularity' and positions the company for margin expansion and cash flow growth. Guidance remains firm with FY adjusted EPS of $7.30–$7.60, and 2026 is expected to reveal substantial synergy benefits and a potential 20% upside.
